Column.name: Template
Column.value:
$COMMENT="WARNING: DO NOT MODIFY THIS TEMPLATE BELOW THIS POINT" %ImportSection%
 %if easlRequired == "T"% %EASL_INIT(classGUID)% %endIf% %list="Class" @separator="

"% %EASL_END()%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
$bases=%ClassInherits% %if $bases != ""% $bases=" " + $bases %endIf% $generic=%list="ClassParameter" @separator=", "% %if $generic != ""% $generic="<" + $generic + ">" %endIf%
$annotations=%classTag:"annotations"% %REPLACE($annotations, "@", "\n @")%
%PI=" "% %CONVERT_SCOPE(classScope)% %classStereotype=="static" ? "static" : ""% %classIsLeaf == "T" ? "final" : ""%
%if elemType == "Interface"% %PI=""% %classStereotype=="annotation" ? "@"% interface %className%$generic$bases %endTemplate%
%classAbstract=="T" ? "abstract" : ""% %classStereotype=="enumeration" ? "enum" : "class"% %className%$generic$bases
%if genOptStmJavaUseNewTemplate == "T" and stmContextHasStatemachine == "T"% %if genOptStmJavaObjectOriented == "T"% implements StateMachineLib.BehavioredClassifier %else% implements StateMachineContext %endIf% %endIf%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%if elemType == "Interface"% %PI="

"% { %list="InnerClass" @separator="

" @indent="	"% %list="Attribute" @separator="
" @indent="	"% %list="Operation" @separator="

" @indent="	"% } %endTemplate%
%PI="

"% { %list="InnerClass" @separator="

" @indent="	"% %list="Attribute" @separator="
" @indent="	"%
%if genOptStmCSharpUseNewTemplate != "T" or stmContextHasStatemachine != "T"% $ops="" %if genOptGenConstructor == "T" and classHasConstructor != "T"% $ops+="	public "+%className%+"(){

	}" %endIf%
%if genOptGenDestructor == "T" and classHasDestructor != "T"% $ops+="

	public void finalize() throws Throwable {
" $ops+=%classHasParent=="T" ? "		super.finalize();" : ""% + "
	}" %endIf% %endIf%
%PI="
"% $StateMachineGUID = %EASL_GET("Property", classGUID, "StateMachine")% $sProp = %EASLList="Property" @separator="
" @indent="	" @owner=classGUID @collection="Properties"% $sBehaviors = %EASLList="Behavior" @separator="
" @indent="	" @owner=classGUID @collection="Behaviors"%
$ops %list="Operation" @separator="

" @indent="	"%
%if $sProp != ""% /* Begin - EA generated code for Parts and Ports */ $sProp /* End - EA generated code for Parts and Ports */ %endIf%
%if $sBehaviors != ""% /* Begin - EA generated code for Activities and Interactions */ $sBehaviors /* End - EA generated code for Activities and Interactions */ %endIf%
%if $StateMachineGUID != "" and genOptStmJavaUseNewTemplate != "T"% /* Begin - EA generated code for StateMachine */ %StateMachine()% /* End - EA generated code for StateMachine */ %endIf%
%if genOptStmJavaUseNewTemplate == "T" and stmContextHasStatemachine == "T"% /* Begin - EA generated code for StateMachine */ 
 %StmContextDefinition% 
 /* End - EA generated code for StateMachine */ %endIf% }//end %className%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%if elemType == "Interface"% %PI=""% $bases=%list="ClassBase" @separator=", "% $bases+=%list="ClassInterface" @separator=", "% %if $bases != ""% extends $bases %endIf% %endTemplate%
%PI=""% $bases=%list="ClassBase" @separator=" "% $interfaces=%list="ClassInterface" @separator=", "% %if $bases != "" and $interfaces != ""% extends $bases implements $interfaces %elseIf $bases != ""% extends $bases %elseIf $interfaces != ""% implements $interfaces %endIf%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%if classStereotype=="enumeration"% %if attStereotype=="enum" or attIsEnumLiteral=="T"% %PI=""% %attName% %attTag:"arguments" ? "(" value ")"% %endTemplate% %endIf%
%attTag:"Attribute"% %attTag:"annotations"% %PI=" "% %CONVERT_SCOPE(attScope)% %attStatic=="T" ? "static" : ""% %attConst=="T" ? "final" : ""% %attVolatile=="T" ? "volatile" : ""% %attTag:"transient"=="true" ? "transient" : ""%
$COMMENT=%ConvertSqlType(attType)% List<String>
%PI=""% %attName% %if attCollection == "T" and attContainerType != ""% %attContainerType% %endIf% %attInitial ? " = " value% ;

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%if importInFile=="T" or importPackagePath=="" or importPackagePath==packagePath% %endTemplate%
%if importClassPath != ""% import %importPackagePath%.%importClassPath%.%importClassName%; %else% import %importPackagePath%.%importClassName%; %endIf%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
$COMMENT="WARNING: THIS IS AN ADVANCED TEMPLATE" $COMMENT="DO NOT MODIFY UNLESS YOU ARE AN" $COMMENT="ADVANCED USER!"
%if packagePath != "" and packagePath != "." and packagePath != ".\"% %if genOptStmJavaUseNewTemplate == "T" and stmContextHasStatemachine == "T"% //package %packagePath%; //Comment out for EA Statemachine simulation purpose 
 %else% //package %packagePath%;
 //Comment out if running well - add package declaration to import section until fixed %endIf% %endIf%
%if genOptStmJavaUseNewTemplate == "T" and stmContextHasStatemachine == "T"% import java.util.*;
 %endIf%
$imports = %fileImports% + "
" $imports += %fileHeaders% + "
" $imports += %list="Import" @separator="
" importFromAggregation=="T" or importFromAssociation=="T" or importFromAtt=="T" or importFromDependency=="T" or importFromGeneralization=="T" or importFromMeth=="T" or importFromParam=="T" or importFromRealization=="T"% %REMOVE_DUPLICATES($imports, "
")%

Column.name: Template
Template
Column.value:
%PI=""% $GUID = $parameter1 $sOption = $parameter2 %if $GUID==""% %endTemplate%
$EQ = "="
$TRANSITION_TYPE = "TransitionType" $STATE_TYPE = "StateType" $NEXT_STATE = "nextState" $CURR_STATE = "currState" $CURR_TRANSITION = "currTransition" $TRANSCEND_VAR = "transcend" $HISTORY_SUFFIX = "_history" $STATES_NOSTATE = "ST_NOSTATE" $STAY_IN_CURRENT_STATE_VAR = "bStayInCurrentState"
$bIsTriggered = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "IsTriggered")% $bHasEffect = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "HasEffect")% $bIsTranscend= %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "IsTranscend")% $Target = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Target")% $bIsFinal = %EASL_GET("Property", $Target, "IsFinalState")% $sGuardExpr = %EASLList="Guard" @separator=" && " @indent="\t" @owner=$GUID @collection="Guards"%
%if $sOption=="TriggeredGuarded"% %if $bIsTriggered=="false" or $sGuardExpr ==""% %endTemplate% %elseIf $sOption=="TriggeredUnGuarded"% %if $bIsTriggered=="false" or $sGuardExpr !=""% %endTemplate% %elseIf $sOption=="UnTriggeredGuarded"% %if $bIsTriggered=="true" or $sGuardExpr ==""% %endTemplate% %elseIf $sOption=="UnTriggeredUnGuarded"% %if $bIsTriggered=="true" or $sGuardExpr !=""% %endTemplate% %endIf%
%if $bIsFinal=="true"% $sTargetName = $STATES_NOSTATE + "/*Final State*/" %else% $sTargetName = %StateEnumeratedName($Target)% %endIf%
$Source = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Source")%
%if $Target == "" or $Source == ""% %endTemplate%
$bIsHistory = %EASL_GET("Property", $Target, "IsHistory")% %if $sGuardExpr!=""% $sGuardExpr = %TRIM($sGuardExpr)% %endIf%
$sTriggerExpr = %EASLList="Trigger" @separator=" && " @indent="\t" @owner=$GUID @collection="Triggers"% %PI="\n"% %if $bIsTriggered=="true" and $sTriggerExpr != ""% $sTriggerExpr = %TRIM($sTriggerExpr)% %endIf%
$Tab = "\t" %if $bIsTriggered=="true" and $sTriggerExpr != "" and $sGuardExpr != ""% else if($sTriggerExpr && $sGuardExpr) %elseIf $bIsTriggered=="true" and $sTriggerExpr != "" and $sGuardExpr == ""% else if($sTriggerExpr) %elseIf $sGuardExpr != ""% else if($sGuardExpr) %else% else if(true) %endIf% { $Tab$STAY_IN_CURRENT_STATE_VAR $EQ false; \n %if $bIsHistory == "true"% $TargetParent = %EASL_GET("Property", $Target, "Parent")% $sTargetHistory = %StateEnumeratedName($TargetParent)% + $HISTORY_SUFFIX $Tab$NEXT_STATE $EQ $sTargetHistory; %else% $Tab$NEXT_STATE $EQ $STATE_TYPE.$sTargetName; %endIf%
%if $bHasEffect == "true"% $sTransition=%StateEnumeratedName($GUID)% $Tab$CURR_TRANSITION $EQ $TRANSITION_TYPE.$sTransition; %endIf%
%if $bIsTranscend == "true"% $SourceParent = %EASL_GET("Property", $Source, "Parent")% $sSourceHistory = %StateEnumeratedName($SourceParent)% + $HISTORY_SUFFIX $Tab$TRANSCEND_VAR $EQ true; $Tab$sSourceHistory $EQ $CURR_STATE; %else% $Tab$TRANSCEND_VAR $EQ false; %endIf% }

Column.name: Template
Template
Column.value:
%PI=""% $GUID = $parameter1 %if $GUID==""% %endTemplate% $BehKind = %EASL_GET("Property",$GUID,"Kind")% $BehSpecification = %EASL_GET("Property",$GUID,"Specification")%
$COMMENT = "Operations are taken care already" %if $BehKind == "Operation"% %endTemplate%
$COMMENT = "Behavior is associated to another specification" %if $BehSpecification != ""% %endTemplate%
%BehaviorDeclaration($GUID)% %BehaviorBody($GUID)%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
$type=%linkAttName%
%if linkAttCollectionClass != "" and linkCard != "" and linkCard != "0" and linkCard != "0..1" and linkCard != "1"% $type=%linkAttCollectionClass% %elseIf linkIsBound == "T"% $type = $type + "<" + %linkParamSubs% + ">" %endIf%
%PI=" "% %CONVERT_SCOPE(linkAttAccess)% %linkAttTargetScope=="classifier" ? "static" : ""% $type %PI=""%
%if linkAttRole != ""% %linkAttRole%; %else% %REPLACE(genOptDefaultAssocAttName,"$LinkClass",linkAttName)%; %endIf%

Column.name: Template
Template
Column.value:
%PI=""% $GUID = $parameter1 $list = $parameter2
%if $GUID==""% %endTemplate%
$index = "0"
%if $list==""% $list = %EASL_GET("Collection", $GUID, "SubActions")% %endIf%
$count = %EASL_GET("Count", $list)% %if $count=="" or $count == $index% %endTemplate%
$COMMENT = "Get the indexed guarded child action" $guardedAction = %EASL_GET("At", $list, $index)%
$kind = %EASL_GET("Property", $guardedAction, "Kind")% %if $kind != "Guarded"% $kind\n\n %endTemplate%
$guard = %EASL_GET("Property", $guardedAction, "Guard")% $expression = %EASL_GET("Property", $guard, "Expression")% %if $expression != ""% if ($expression)\n {\n $TAB = "\t" %endIf%
%EASLList="Action" @separator="\n" @indent="\t" @owner=$guardedAction @collection="SubActions"% $TAB break; // break condition encountered...
%if $expression != ""% \n } %endIf%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%PI=""% $EQ = "="
$GUID = $parameter1 %if $GUID==""% %endTemplate%
$sActionName = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Name")%
$context = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Context")% $contextClassifier = %EASL_GET("Property", $context, "Classifier")%
$behavior = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Behavior")% $arguments = %EASLList="CallArgument" @separator="," @owner=$GUID @collection="Arguments"%
$target = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Pin", "Target")%
$sUMLType = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "UMLType")% $BehParent = %EASL_GET("Property", $behavior, "Parent")%
$sBehName = %EASL_GET("Property", $behavior, "Name")% %if $sBehName == ""% /*Warning: $sActionName - Associated behavior not found within the package!!*/ %endTemplate%
%if $sUMLType=="uml:CallBehaviorAction" and $BehParent != "" and $BehParent != classGUID% /*Warning: $sBehName - Invoking behaviors from other classes - Not Supported!!*/ %endTemplate%
%if $sUMLType=="uml:CallOperationAction" and $BehParent != "" and $BehParent != classGUID and $target==""% /*Warning: $sBehName - Invoking operations from other classes requires a "target" pin to be configured!!*/ %endTemplate%
%if $target != "" and $BehParent != classGUID% $sPropName = %EASL_GET("Property", $target, "Name")% %else% $sPropName = %EASL_GET("Property", $context, "Name")% %endIf%
$Result = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Pin", "Result")% $sResultName = %EASL_GET("Property",$Result,"Name")% %if $sResultName != ""% $sResultName $EQ %endIf%
%if $sPropName != ""% $sPropName. %endIf%
$sBehName($arguments);

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%PI=""% $GUID = $parameter1 %if $GUID==""% %endTemplate%
$sActionName = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Name")% $classifier = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Classifier")% $sClassifierName = %EASL_GET("Property", $classifier, "Name")%
$sUMLType = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "UMLType")%
%if $sUMLType=="uml:CreateObjectAction"% $result = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Pin", "Result")% %if $result == ""% /*Warning: $sActionName - Result Pin Not Found!*/ %endTemplate% $sObjectName = %EASL_GET("Property", $result, "Name")% %else% $context = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Context")% %if $context ==""% /*Warning: $sActionName - Context object not found!*/ %endTemplate% $sObjectName = %EASL_GET("Property", $context, "Name")% %endIf%
%if $classifier == ""% /*Warning: $sActionName - No valid classifier set!*/ %endTemplate%
%if $sClassifierName!="" and $sObjectName !=""% $sClassifierName $sObjectName = new $sClassifierName(); %endIf%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%PI=""% $GUID = $parameter1 %if $GUID==""% %endTemplate%
$sActionName = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Name")%
$sUMLType = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "UMLType")%
%if $sUMLType=="uml:DestroyObjectAction"% $target = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Pin", "Target")% %if $target == ""% /*Warning: $sActionName - Target Pin Not Found!*/ %endTemplate% $sObjectName = %EASL_GET("Property", $target, "Name")% %else% $context = %EASL_GET("Property", $GUID, "Context")% %if $context ==""% /*Warning: $sActionName - Context object not found!*/ %endTemplate% $sObjectName = %EASL_GET("Property", $context, "Name")% %endIf%
$sObjectName = null;

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%PI=""% $GUID = $parameter1 $list = $parameter2 $index = $parameter3 %if $GUID==""% %endTemplate%
%if $index==""% $index = "0" %endIf%
%if $list==""% $list = %EASL_GET("Collection", $GUID, "SubActions")% %endIf%
$count = %EASL_GET("Count", $list)% %if $count=="" or $count == $index% %endTemplate%
$COMMENT = "Get the indexed guarded child action" $guardedAction = %EASL_GET("At", $list, $index)%
$kind = %EASL_GET("Property", $guardedAction, "Kind")% %if $kind != "Guarded"% $kind

 %endTemplate%
$guard = %EASL_GET("Property", $guardedAction, "Guard")% $expression = %EASL_GET("Property", $guard, "Expression")% %if $index == "0"% if ($expression)
 %elseIf $expression != ""% else if ($expression)
 %else% else
 %endIf%
{
 %EASLList="Action" @separator="
" @indent="	" @owner=$guardedAction @collection="SubActions"%
 }
$COMMENT = "Get the next indexed guarded child action" $index = %MATH_ADD($index, "1")% %if $index != $count% 
 %endIf% %ActionIf($GUID, $list, $index)%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%PI=""% $GUID = $parameter1 %if $GUID==""% %endTemplate%
$COMMENT = "Get the first guarded child action - representing the iteration" $list = %EASL_GET("Collection", $GUID, "SubActions")% $guardedAction = %EASL_GET("At", $list, "0")%
$kind = %EASL_GET("Property", $guardedAction, "Kind")% %if $kind != "Guarded"% %endTemplate%
$guard = %EASL_GET("Property", $guardedAction, "Guard")% $expression = %EASL_GET("Property", $guard, "Expression")% $upper = %EASL_GET("Property", $guard, "Upper")% $lower = %EASL_GET("Property", $guard, "Lower")%
%if $expression != ""% while ($expression)
 %elseIf $lower != ""% for ($lower; $upper; ;)
 %else% while (true)
 %endIf%
{
 %EASLList="Action" @separator="
" @indent="	" @owner=$guardedAction @collection="SubActions"%
 }

Column.name: Template
Template
Column.value:
%PI=""% $GUID = $parameter1 $list = $parameter2 $index = $parameter3 %if $GUID==""% %endTemplate%
%if $index==""% $index = "0" %endIf%
%if $list==""% $list = %EASL_GET("Collection", $GUID, "SubActions")% %endIf%
$count = %EASL_GET("Count", $list)% %if $count=="" or $count == $index% %endTemplate%
$COMMENT = "Get the indexed guarded child action" $guardedAction = %EASL_GET("At", $list, $index)%
$kind = %EASL_GET("Property", $guardedAction, "Kind")% %if $kind != "Guarded"% $kind\n\n %endTemplate%
$guard = %EASL_GET("Property", $guardedAction, "Guard")% $expression = %EASL_GET("Property", $guard, "Expression")%
%PI="\n"% $sSubActions = %EASLList="Action" @separator="\n" @indent="\t\t\t\t" @owner=$guardedAction @collection="SubActions"% %if $sSubActions != ""% new Thread( new Runnable() { public void run() { try { $sSubActions } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); } } }).start(); %endIf% $index = %MATH_ADD($index, "1")% %ActionParallel($GUID, $list, $index)%
